description: Palindromic binomial coefficients C(n,k) for k >= 2.
references: Alfred S. Posamentier & Ingmar Lehmann, The (Fabulous) Fibonacci Numbers, Prometheus Books, NY, 2007, page 93.
mathematica: fQ[n_] := Block[{id = IntegerDigits@n}, id == Reverse@id]; lst = {}; Do[ k = 2; While[k < n/2 + 1, b = Binomial[n, k]; If[fQ@b, AppendTo[lst, b]; Print@b]; k++ ], {n, 25000000}]; Take[ Union@ lst, 35] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_ *)
author: Joe DeMaio (jdemaio(AT)kennesaw.edu)
extensions: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 20 2000
